item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA05g16710 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK13 Gene Name: Capsicum annuum CBL-interacting protein kinases Genome: Pepper.

item.title: CaM6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g098050 Gene Symbol: CaM6 Gene Name: CALMODULIN6 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: CaMYB340
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB340 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Description: Transient CaMYB340 silencing increased FA desaturation and lowered electrolyte leakage, enhancing cold tolerance in CaMYB340 knockdown fruits.

item.title: CDS1;OsCNGC9
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os09g38580 RAPdb gene ID: Os09g0558300 Gene Symbol: CDS1 OsCNGC9 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CrNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase1 Genome: Species: Citrus reshni Functional Descriptions: Molecular cloning and characterization of CrNCED1, a gene encoding 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase in Citrus reshni, with functions in tolerance to multiple abiotic stresses.

item.title: CsbHLH18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g024930m Gene Symbol: CsbHLH18 Gene Name: basic helix–loop–helix transcription factor 18 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CsbHLH18 of sweet orange functions in modulation of cold tolerance and homeostasis of reactive oxygen species by regulating the antioxidant gene.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: CsCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g10240 Gene Symbol: CsCBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: CsCOR413PM2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa_2G238250.1 Gene Symbol: CsCOR413PM2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Suppression of CsCOR413PM2 decreased cold tolerance of cucumber.

item.title: CsGPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa_4G648550.1 Gene Symbol: CsGPA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Mechanism of CsGPA1 in regulating cold tolerance of cucumber.

item.title: CsHSFA1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G008920 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1d Gene Name: heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Report that heat shock induces cold acclimation in cucumber seedlings, via a process involving the heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d.

item.title: CsINV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsINV5 Gene Name: Vacuolar invertase 5 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsINV5, a tea vacuolar invertase gene enhances cold tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis.

item.title: Ctb1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g52830 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0619300 Gene Symbol: Ctb1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CTB4a

item.title: CYC-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g074240 Gene Symbol: CYC-B Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: DgATX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgATX Gene Name: Chrysanthemum morifolium ARABIDOPSIS HOMOLOG OF TRITHORAX Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: DgbZIP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgbZIP3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: DgbZIP3 interacts with DgbZIP2 to increase the expression of DgPOD for cold stress tolerance in chrysanthemum.

item.title: DgMYB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgMYB Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: DgMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgMYB2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: DgMYB2 improves cold resistance in chrysanthemum by directly targeting DgGPX1.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified a temperature-induced lipocalin-1-like gene (DgTIL1) from chrysanthemum and showed that it was notably induced in response to cold stress.

item.title: DgTIL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DgTIL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Lysine crotonylation of DgTIL1 at K72 modulates cold tolerance by enhancing DgnsLTP stability in chrysanthemum.

item.title: EFA27;OsClo5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g43200 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0511200 Gene Symbol: EFA27 OsClo5 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: EguCBF1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: EguCBF1a Gene Name: C-repeat binding factor 1 Genome: Species: Eucalyptus gunnii Functional Descriptions: Two C-repeat binding factor genes (EguCBF1a/EguCBF1b), isolated from E.

item.title: EguCBF1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: EguCBF1b Gene Name: C-repeat binding factor 1 Genome: Species: Eucalyptus gunnii Functional Descriptions: Two C-repeat binding factor genes (EguCBF1a/EguCBF1b), isolated from E.

item.title: FcWRKY70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcWRKY70 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 70 Genome: Species: Fortunella crassifolia Functional Descriptions: FcWRKY70, a WRKY protein of Fortunella crassifolia, functions in drought tolerance and modulates putrescine synthesis by regulating arginine decarboxylase gene.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhHSP70-26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gohir.D06G173000 Gene Symbol: GhHSP70-26 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GmDREB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmDREB3 Gene Name: dehydration-responsive element binding protein 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Cold-induced modulation and functional analyses of the DRE-binding transcription factor gene, GmDREB3, in soybean.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GS2;OsGRF4
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g47280 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0701300 Gene Symbol: GS2 OsGRF4 GL2 GLW2 LGS1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Hd5;DTH8
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g07740 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0174500 Gene Symbol: Hd5 DTH8 Ghd8 OsHAP3H LHD1 EF8 CAR8 OsNF-YB11 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: IbSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbSnRK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Description: These results show that the IbSnRK1 gene confers salt, drought, and cold tolerance in sweet potato by activating the ROS scavenging system and controlling stomatal closure via the ABA signaling pathway.

item.title: ICE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g118310 Gene Symbol: ICE1 Gene Name: INDUCER of CBF EXPRESSION 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: LTG5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g45110 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0527100 Gene Symbol: LTG5 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: LTT1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os10g34110 RAPdb gene ID: Os10g0482200 Gene Symbol: LTT1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MaICE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaICE1 Gene Name: transcription factor ICE1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Banana fruit NAC transcription factor MaNAC1 is a direct target of MaICE1 and involved in cold stress through interacting with MaCBF1.

item.title: MaMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma06_g34790 Gene Symbol: MaMAPK3|MaMAPK3a Gene Name: Genome: genome database of Musa (http://banana-genome-hub.

item.title: MdABI4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD07G1224400 Gene Symbol: MdABI4 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdbHLH33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdbHLH33 Gene Name: Malus domestica basic helix-loop-helix 33 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdBIM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143208 Gene Symbol: MdBIM1 Gene Name: BES1-INTERACTING MYC-LIKE PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Brassinosteroid signaling regulator BIM1 (MdBIM1) integrates brassinolide and jasmonic acid signaling during cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdCIbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdCIbHLH1 Gene Name: Cold-Induced bHLH1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The cold-induced basic helix-loop-helix transcription factor gene MdCIbHLH1encodes an ICE-like protein in apple.

item.title: MdHDA6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHDA6 Gene Name: HISTONE DEACETYLASE 6 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: histone deacetylase 6 (MdHDA6), which negatively regulates apple drought tolerance by catalyzing deacetylation on histones associated with drought-responsive genes.

item.title: MdHYL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHYL1 Gene Name: HYPONASTIC LEAVES1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The RNA-binding protein MdHYL1 modulates cold tolerance and disease resistance in apple.

item.title: MdICE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000662999 Gene Symbol: MdICE1 Gene Name: MYC-type bHLH transcription factor ICE1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Further study showed that MdPUB23 directly interacted with MdICE1, promoting the ubiquitination-mediated degradation of the MdICE1 protein through the 26S-proteasome pathway and reducing the MdICE1-improved cold-stress tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000452772 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ1 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: MdJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000757701 Gene Symbol: MdJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) protein 2 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The jasmonate-ZIM domain (JAZ) proteins MdJAZ1 and MdJAZ2 negatively modulate MdABI4-improved cold tolerance in apple by interacting with the MdABI4 protein.

item.title: MdMIEL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMIEL1 Gene Name: MYB30-INTERACTING E3 LIGASE 1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdMYB23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000230141 Gene Symbol: MdMYB23 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 23 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: R2R3-MYB transcription factor MdMYB23 is involved in the cold tolerance and proanthocyanidin accumulation in apple.

item.title: MdMYB308L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000950559 Gene Symbol: MdMYB308L Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdNAC104
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1415700 Gene Symbol: MdNAC104 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdPUB23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1040300 Gene Symbol: MdPUB23 Gene Name: U-box-type E3 ubiquitin ligase Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple U-box-type E3 ubiquitin ligase MdPUB23 reduces cold-stress tolerance by degrading the cold-stress regulatory protein MdICE1.

item.title: MdTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD13G1073500 Gene Symbol: MdTCP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Histone deacetylase MdHDA6 is an antagonist in regulation of transcription factor MdTCP15 to promote cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdWRKY40is
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1039500 Gene Symbol: MdWRKY40is Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MfAOC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MfAOC2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results suggest that expression of MfAOC2 or MtAOC2 promotes biosynthesis of JA, which positively regulates expression of CBF genes and antioxidant defense under cold conditions and expression of JA downstream genes after pathogen infection, leading to greater cold tolerance and pathogen resistance.

item.title: MhDREB2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MhDREB2A Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MhZAT10

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtCML42 Gene Name: Genome: M.

item.title: MusaDHN-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaDHN-1 Gene Name: SK3-type dehydrin Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MusaDHN-1, a novel multiple stress-inducible SK3-type dehydrin gene, contributes affirmatively to drought- and salt-stress tolerance in banana.

item.title: MusaPIP1;2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MusaPIP1;2 Gene Name: Aquaporin PIP1-2 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Transgenic banana plants overexpressing a native plasma membrane aquaporin MusaPIP1;2 display high tolerance levels to different abiotic stresses.

item.title: PbrWRKY53
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr018725.1 Gene Symbol: PbrWRKY53 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 53 Genome: Species: Pyrus betulaefolia Functional Descriptions: A WRKY transcription factor PbrWRKY53 from Pyrus betulaefolia is involved in drought tolerance and AsA accumulation.

item.title: PeSTZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PeSTZ1 Gene Name: SALT TOLERANCE ZINC FINGER 1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: PeSTZ1, a C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor from Populus euphratica, enhances freezing tolerance through modulation of ROS scavenging by directly regulating PeAPX2.
